alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:12PM CST until January 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Iowa and northeast Nebraska. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 6 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
